00044 #ifndef H_XmlUtils 
00045 # define H_XmlUtils

00054 namespace TREX {
00055   namespace utils {
00056 
00065     class XmlError :public Exception {
00066     public:
00074       XmlError(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node,
00075               std::string const &msg) throw() 
00076        :Exception(std::string("On ")+
00077                  std::string(node.name(), 
00078                             node.name_size())+": "+msg) {}
00080       virtual ~XmlError() throw() {}
00081     }; // TREX::utils::FactoryException
00082     
00100     template<class Ty>
00101     Ty parse_attr(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, 
00102                 std::string const &attr) {
00103       rapidxml::xml_attribute<> const *a = node.first_attribute(attr.c_str());
00104       if( NULL==a ) 
00105        throw XmlError(node, std::string("Unable to find attribute ")+attr);
00106       return string_cast<Ty>(std::string(a->value(), a->value_size()));
00107     }
00108 
00128     template<class Ty>
00129     Ty parse_attr(Ty const &on_missing, 
00130                 rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, 
00131                 std::string const &attr) {
00132       rapidxml::xml_attribute<> const *a = node.first_attribute(attr.c_str());
00133       if( NULL==a )
00134        return on_missing;
00135       else 
00136        return string_cast<Ty>(std::string(a->value(), a->value_size()));
00137     }
00138 
00146     inline bool is_tag(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node,
00147                      std::string const &tag) {
00148       return 0==tag.compare(0, std::string::npos, 
00149                          node.name(), node.name_size());
00150     }
00151 
00164     class ext_iterator {
00165     public:
00168       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<>  value_type;
00171       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<> &reference;
00174       typedef rapidxml::xml_node<> *pointer;
00175 
00179       ext_iterator()
00180        :m_current(NULL), m_doc_root(NULL) {}
00186       ext_iterator(ext_iterator const &other)
00187        :m_external(other.m_external), m_current(other.m_current),
00188         m_file(other.m_file), m_doc(other.m_doc), 
00189         m_doc_root(other.m_doc_root) {}
00195       explicit ext_iterator(rapidxml::xml_node<> &node);
00216       ext_iterator(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node, std::string const &conf);
00218       ~ext_iterator() {}
00219 
00227       bool valid() const {
00228        return NULL!=m_current;
00229       }
00236       bool operator !() const {
00237        return !valid();
00238       }
00256       bool external() const {
00257        return valid() && m_external;
00258       }
00267       bool hasExternal() const {
00268        return NULL!=m_doc_root;
00269       }
00270 
00286       ext_iterator externalBegin(char *name=NULL) const;
00287        
00297       pointer   operator->() const;
00307       reference operator* () const {
00308        return *operator->();
00309       }
00310       
00322       ext_iterator &next(std::string const &name =std::string());
00331       ext_iterator &operator++() {
00332        return next();
00333       }
00334       
00344       ext_iterator find_tag(std::string const &name) const;
00345 
00346     private:
00347       bool m_external;
00348       rapidxml::xml_node<> *m_current;
00349       
00350       typedef boost::shared_ptr< rapidxml::file<> > file_ref;
00351       typedef boost::shared_ptr< rapidxml::xml_document<> > doc_ref;
00352       file_ref m_file;
00353       doc_ref m_doc;
00354       rapidxml::xml_node<> *m_doc_root;
00355 
00370       static file_ref load(rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *attr);
00371 
00372       static SingletonUse<LogManager> s_log;
00373     }; 
00374 
00375     template<class Ty>
00376     Ty xml_conf_var(ext_iterator const &conf, std::string const &tag) {
00377       ext_iterator tmp(conf.find_tag(tag));
00378       if( !tmp )
00379        throw XmlError(*conf, "Unable to find tag \""+tag+"\".");
00380       return parse_attr<Ty>(*tmp, "value");
00381     }
00382 
00383     template<class Ty>
00384     Ty xml_conf_var(ext_iterator const &conf, std::string const &tag, 
00385                   Ty const &on_missing) {
00386       ext_iterator tmp(conf.find_tag(tag));
00387       if( !tmp )
00388        return on_missing;
00389       return parse_attr<Ty>(on_missing, *tmp, "value");
00390     }
